classification.input: The Vendor shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the Customer.
All information marked 'Confidential' shall be kept strictly confidential.
Either party may terminate this Agreement upon thirty (30) days notice.
This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of Delaware.
Any dispute shall be resolved by binding arbitration in New York.

risk_detection.input: Provider shall have no liability whatsoever for any damages.
We may modify these terms at any time without notice.
Liability limited to fees paid in last 12 months.

multilingual.input: Le Prestataire s'engage à indemniser le Client.
Le Fournisseur n'assume aucune responsabilité pour les dommages indirects.
Der Auftragnehmer verpflichtet sich, den Auftraggeber freizustellen.
Wir behalten uns das Recht vor, diese Bedingungen jederzeit ohne Ankündigung zu ändern.

employment.input: Employee agrees not to work for any competitor within a 50-mile radius for 12 months.
Upon termination without cause, Employee shall receive 6 months severance pay.
All inventions created during employment belong exclusively to the Company.
Employee waives all claims including discrimination rights in exchange for $100.
Employment is at-will and may be terminated by either party with notice.

ma.input: Seller represents that there are no pending legal proceedings against the Company.
Seller shall indemnify Buyer for valid claims up to the Cap Amount of $5M.
Closing is conditioned upon receipt of HSR antitrust approval.
Seller provides property 'as is' with no representations or warranties whatsoever.
10% of Purchase Price shall be held in escrow for 18 months to secure indemnification.
